name: Dominion – Domain Checker for WPBakery
author: Fluent Themes

sections.description:
Dominion Domain Checker is higly flexible Domain Checker plugin which allows you to place a Domain Search form in your page/post with full control over the design of the form. By using Dominion domain checker form, your users will be able to swiftly check domain name availability from your WordPress site and even you can place Purchase URL of your domain selling page in order to sell your domains. With the help of drag and drop WPBakery page builder it is just a matter of couple of minutes to build a domain search form in your website. Dominion plugin is made with AJAX and easy to use with WPBakery page builder.

Don’t have the WPBakery page builder? No Worries ‚ú®
You can use this plugin WITHOUT any page builder also. To do so you need to input the shortcode in your page/post editor. View the FAQs Section for details.

What makes Dominion Version 2.0 Special

This new version (2.0) includes the most flexible features. The improvements made in this version are listed below:
‚ú® Option added to use Domain Purchase Button URL for Searched Domains. Now you can place Purchase URL of your domain selling page in order to sell your domains
‚ú® Option added to use Parallax Background Image, makes the form look cool
‚ú® 9 more options added to change Font Size, Font Weight, Line Height for Heading, Sub-Heading and Text of the Form
‚ú® 9 more options added to choose your desired Color for Title, Sub Title, Text, Button lable, Search result texts, Button background, Section background and Placeholder text
‚ú® 3 more options added to choose Hover Color for Text, Button lable, Button background and Section background

Features

  • Check domain name availability for any TLD
  • No need domain reseller API
  • List/Include unlimited TLD (extensions) of Domains in the dropdown of the Domain Checker form
  • Use your Domain Purchase Button URL for Searched Domains
  • Change the text for Search field placeholder, Buttons, Title, Sub-Title and Texts of the form
  • Customize the look and feel of the domain checker form to match your website
  • Use Parallax Background Image
  • Choose Font Size, Font Weight, Line Height for Heading, Sub-Heading and Text of the form
  • Unlimited color variations to choose from for Title, Sub Title, Text, Button lable, Search result texts, Button background, Placeholder text, Section background and more
  • Choose Mouse Over (Hover) Color for Text, Button lable, Button background, Section background
  • Easily use with WPBakery Page Builder
  • Made with AJAX
  • And more…

Shortcode: ‚úç [dominion_shortcodes_domain_search_6]

PRO Version Features

View PRO Version

PRO Version Features

  • 10 more Layout and Design to choose from
  • Option to integrated Domain purchase button with WHMCS
  • Transfer Domain feature with WHMCS
  • Enable Google reCAPTCHA v2
  • Enable Animation (35+ variations of animations to choose from)
  • Adjust Width of the form field for desktop and mobile to make it responsive
  • Choose Shape/Margin/Padding of the Domain Search Section
  • Choose Title Tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, div, span, p)
  • Choose any Font Family from Google Fonts for Heading and Sub-Heading of the Form
  • Check domain name availability for any TLD(s)
  • Plus all the features of the Free Version
  • Video Tutorials Included
  • 6 Months Priority Support (typically reply within 24 Hours)
  • Life Time FREE Updates
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Visit your ‘wp-admin – plugins – add new’ page and Upload ‘dominion-domain-checker-wpbakery-addon.zip’ folder there and click on Install button. OR Upload ‘dominion-domain-checker-wpbakery-addon’ folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory using ftp OR cpanel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress. Click on the ‘Settings and Guide’ link given below the name of the plugin.

If you have WPBakery installed, follow the following 3 steps:
1. Switch on your WPBakery backend editor from your wp-admin page editor
2. Click on ‘Add Element’ button and find ‘FT- Domain Search 6’ element and click on it
3. Fill in the Settings fields as you need and click on ‘Save Settings’ button and click on ‘Update’ to update your page

If you do not have WPBakery installed, follow the following steps:
1. Navigate to ‘WP-Admin – Pages – Add New’ and add the ‘Shortcode’ block of your Gutenberg editor.
2. You will get a field to insert your shortcode. Insert shortcode as mentioned below:
[dominion_shortcodes_domain_search_6 title=”TITLE GOES HERE” search_pholder=”SEARCH FIELD PLACEHOLDER TEXT HERE” button_label=”BUTTON TEXT GOES HERE”]
Here title, search_pholder and button_label are parameters of the shortcode. You can change the values of the parameters as you need. There are a lot more parameters you can use with the shortcode. View the FAQs to learn more.
sections.faq:
How to use ?

üé≤ Simple 3 Steps (if WPBakery plugin is installed):
1. Switch on your WPBakery backend editor from your wp-admin page editor
2. Click on ‘Add Element’ button and find ‘FT- Domain Search 6’ element in the ‘Domain Checker’ tab and click on it
3. Fill in the Settings fields as you need and click on ‘Save Changes’ button

Can I use this plugin without WPBakery ? If yes, How ?

Yes, you can. In that case you will need to input the shortcode parameters in your wp-admin page/post editor.
üé≤ Steps to use Dominion if WPBakery plugin is not installed:
1. Navigate to ‘WP-Admin – Pages – Add New’ and add the ‘Shortcode’ block of your Gutenberg editor.
2. You will get a field to insert your shortcode. Insert shortcode as mentioned below:
[dominion_shortcodes_domain_search_6 title=”TITLE GOES HERE” search_pholder=”SEARCH FIELD PLACEHOLDER TEXT HERE” button_label=”BUTTON TEXT GOES HERE”]
Here title, search_pholder and button_label are parameters of the shortcode. You can change the values of the parameters as you need. Find here the list of all the parameters
Note: Some parameters of the above list may not work on free version, because a few parameters on this list are for PRO version only.

Should I purchase a pro version ?

PRO Version Features are listed above. If you need any features on that list, you may consider purchasing pro version. Otherwise the free version is good enough.

To learn more about Pro version or view the demo of Pro version, visit our plugin page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial version

1.4.0

  • Improvement : Compatible with new WordPress versions
  • Fix : Fixed domain checker without Ajax not working properly

1.4.1

  • Improvement : Default values of Title and Subtitle parameters updated

1.4.2

  • Improvement : Compatible with new WordPress version v5.6

1.5.0

  • Improvement : New TLDs included – .new .app .page .how.
  • Improvement : Compatible with new WordPress version v5.6.2

1.7.0

  • Improvement : Compatible with new WordPress version v5.7.1

1.8.0

  • Improvement : WordPress version 5.8.1 compatibility work done.
  • Improvement : Translation file updated according to the latest updates of the strings.

2.0.0

  • Improvement : Option added to use Domain Purchase Button URL for Searched Domains
  • Improvement : Option added to use Parallax Background Image
  • Improvement : Options added to change Font Size, Font Weight, Line Height for Heading, Sub-Heading and Text of the Form
  • Improvement : Options added to choose Color for Title, Sub Title, Text, Button lable, Search result texts, Button background, Section background and Placeholder text
  • Improvement : Option added to choose Hover Color for Text, Button lable, Button background and Section background

2.1.0

  • Improvement : Compatible with latest WordPress version v6.0.2

2.1.1

2.2.1

  • Improvement : Compatible with latest WordPress version v6.6.2

short_description: Dominion Domain Checker is a WordPress plugin which allows you to swiftly check domain name availability from your WordPress site.
